name: Chobirhaat
description: Chobirhaat is a website which is providing different photos items.
bulletPoint: A Marketplace of authentic photos and photographers.
Have a login and registration system with email & password.
Have a different dashboard for the Admin panel and users.
Have an upload system so that users can upload photos.
There is also another dashboard for Admin so that he/she can manage all photos.

name: Dream Street Pottery
description: A dream street pottery website which is providing different pottery items.
bulletPoint: Have a login and registration system with email & password and also google.
Have a different dashboard for the Admin panel and users.
Users can order different pottery items and also can see the order details and delete their orders.
There is also another dashboard for Admin so that he/she can manage all orders and products.
Also, Admin can make a new Admin if needed.

name: Hungry Naki?
description: A hungry naki website which is providing different country food items.
bulletPoint: Have a login and registration system with google.
Order your favorite food online from our website and enjoy at home!
Redirect system is applied in this site.
There is a option named My Order where user can find all orders.
Initially you can order a food and you can cancel it.

name: Honda cbr
description: A Honda cbr website which is providing different country honda products.
bulletPoint: This is a Responsive website
Frequently Ask questions section
Featured bike section.
